page.title: 17Games Children Play!
page.content: To find out the favourite games of children between 6-10 years old.We did a survey by going to Tillington First School and asking the children which games they liked to play and asking a few of our 1st years.We found out that the most popular game was french elastic.The only thing needed to play this game is a piece of long elastic. Two people stand in the elastic and the third person has to jump in,out and on the elastic.The two people at either end move the elastic to different heights.The second best was tig.To play this game you need quite a few people. One person is "on" and chases the other people.When he\she catches someone they are "on."A few other popular games are: football,hide'n'seek,cricket,hopscotch, playfights,bulldog,kisschase,leapfrog, cars and whats the time Mr.Wolf?
